abstract: Waldo Alonso Ponce Carrizo (born 4 December 1982 in Los Andes, Chile) is a Chilean football defender who currently plays for Universidad de Chile.
comment: Waldo Alonso Ponce Carrizo (born 4 December 1982 in Los Andes, Chile) is a Chilean football defender who currently plays for Universidad de Chile.
name: Ponce, Waldo
